review:
The experience was good in their clinic.
Doctor listened to all the queries with patience and then performed Echocardiography and 2D Echocardiography and just found out that there wasn't any problem it may be just because of Daily lifestyle or acidity

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Visited Dr. Ajay seeing practo reviews. But all its true in this case. Dr. Ajay is lost in looking for patient queue and how many patients were there. We visited today and were the first one and the doctor completely engrossed in his own thoughts. Didn't pay any attention and prescribe *** ****** medicine. We told the first one prescribed didn't help in reduction of BP but he was little concerned about it.
Not at all a good clinic I would say
Would never recommend anyone.
reply_text: There must be some reason why a particular medicine was continued which only a specialist can understand.Rather than doing doctor shopping, one should have faith in one doctor and not do self analysis of medicines and treatments, rather reconsult if facing any issues...Managing patients and queue is also the job of owner of clinic but it does not mean that patient care is neglected,each patient poor or rich is important to us...thanks

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
He is a great  doctor  , he listens  patiently to each n every suffering of a patient.   He will suggest  only necessary  test and prescribed  medication.  His consultation  charges are also nominal  in comparison  to other cardiologists in north west  Delhi.  I'll definitely  recommend  this doctor for any cardiac problem. 
 Regards 
mansi uppal
Excellent experience. Doctor has given ample time and listen all the problem and done ecg eco stress tmt
Went to visit the Doctor as per scheduled timing at 6pm. He asked to come at 7pm.very unprofessional.
